oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oliver Tucker Seed Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Horticulture; Seed trade; Farming; Seeds; Truck farming
Agriculture; Commercial catalogs; Memphis (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A soft-cover catalog offering seeds from the Oliver Tucker Seed Company in Memphis, Tennessee. The front and back cover is in full color. The cover shows a little boy with a horseshow with the motto: "My Daddy Plants Tucker's Lucky Seeds. Tell Your Daddy to do so too.."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Oliver Tucker Seed Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On September 1, 1926, the Oliver Tucker Seed Company was organized with Oliver F. Tucker as President. Tucker bought out the interest of the Tucker-Mosby Seed Company.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
